definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

pinyin: wen1 shi4 fei4 qi4 chu3 cun2

sentences.english: One consequence of this is a reduction in the GHG cost of production per kilo of product.
sentences.chinese: 一个结果是生产每公斤产品的温室气体代价的减少。

sentences.english: In order to pine timber, never to the four seasons such as spring greenhouse gallantry.
sentences.chinese: 为了成材，松树从不向四季如春的温室外献殷勤。

sentences.english: And these greenhouse gases perturb the radiation balance of climate.
sentences.chinese: 这些温室气体会扰乱气候的辐射平衡。

sentences.english: In addition to the Pavilion and the Greenhouse, the exhibition will include a 13 story-tall observation tower.
sentences.chinese: 除了馆和温室，该展览还包括一个13层高的瞭望塔。

sentences.english: Central to the hotel tower floors is a light-flooded multi-storey winter-garden, which is facing to the south.
sentences.chinese: 酒店大楼拥有一跨越多层的南向采光温室。

sentences.english: We can set up a system for capping greenhouse gases.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以建立一套控制温室气体排放的体制。

sentences.english: A country like Norway could produce bananas in hothouse.
sentences.chinese: 象挪威那样的国家，在温室中也能种植香蕉。

sentences.english: Raising young plants is an important tache for the production of greenhouse tomato.
sentences.chinese: 育苗是温室番茄生产的一个重要环节。

sentences.english: Swedish university is going to measure the greenhouse gases cows give off when they belch.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典一间大学将要测量牛打嗝时所排放的温室气体。

sentences.english: That would cause the greenhouse effect and begin the terra forming.
sentences.chinese: 这会引起温室效应，继而形成土地。

sentences.english: Asplenium nidus, Conservatory, Hong Kong Park, Central.
sentences.chinese: 雀巢蕨，香港公园温室，中环。

sentences.english: Leonard pottered round the greenhouse, tying up canes for the tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 伦纳德在温室里悠然自得地给西红柿绑上撑杆。

sentences.english: Our greenhouse is nothing compared with yours.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个温室比起你们那个简直是小巫见大巫。

sentences.english: Glasshouses are found mainly in Southern England.
sentences.chinese: 英国的温室主要分布在英格兰南部。

sentences.english: There were suitable to be cultivated in sunlight greenhouse in Xifeng District.
sentences.chinese: 抗病性强，适宜在西峰区日光温室推广种植。

definition: heating/central heating/greenhouse/hothouse/to pay a house-warming visit
